example.description: This command copies the item "sample.txt" from bucket "test-files" to the same bucket but with a new key of "sample-copy.txt".
This command copies the item "sample.txt" from bucket "test-files" to the bucket "backup-files" with a key of "sample-copy.txt".
This command copies the item "sample.txt" from bucket "test-files" to the local file "local-sample.txt". The file "local-sample.txt" does not have to exist before this command is called.
